title: "U.S. Bank adds AI to business travel payments as competition heats up"
excerpt: "U.S. Bancorp on Tuesday launched a travel payments and management platform designed for middle market companies, or firms with $150 million or less in yearly revenue. Called the U.S. Bank Commercial Rewards Card, the product builds on the bank's 2021 acquisition of the fintech TravelBank ."
